pnp:Provisioning.Author: John White
pnp:Provisioning.Description: Example site to manage brand assets

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Site Assets
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use this library to store files which are included on pages within this site, such as images on Wiki pages.

Field.Title: Assigned To
Field.Name: Assigned_x0020_To

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
WE ARE CONTOSO

 

All of our collective experiences make up how we come through as Contoso. Our products, services, communications, and people all shape the perception of our brand, through every interaction and touch point. Together, were defining what it means to be Contoso.We aspire to be a brand that is authentic, inspiring, and relevant. We want to earn peoples love, creating fans that will advocate on our behalf. And you play an important part in doing that.

This is where youll find what you needfrom strategy, to identity elements, to expression examplesto bring our brand to life in a way that is distinctively Contoso.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
FIND PHOTOS
Bring your story to life with the right photography.

GET GUIDELINES
Find the details you need to design for any offering.

PRESENT POWERFULLY
Get the latest templates to make your presentation pop.

CREATIVE PRINCIPLES
Our brand is crafted with care. Consistent expression unifies our experiences all around the world. It helps people recognize the Contoso brand and our family of connected devices, drones and services.

Keep it simple
Create clean, open, timeless designs.

Make it personal
Tailor experiences to the ways that people really think, live, and act.

Create delight
Evoke wonder and discovery.

Details matter
Achieve the highest levels of quality and craft. As with our products, every detail matters. Each moment is an opportunity to elevate quality.

PERSONALITY
Our personality guides our behavior and creates the foundation for how we express ourselves. Understanding who we areapproachable, empathetic, determined, real, and passionateinfluences how our brand takes shape all over the world. Human, connected, intelligent experiences.

Approachable
We're friendly and outgoing, always ready to talk and share ideas.

Empathetic
We listen to people, seeking to understand their goals, hopes, and concerns.

Determined
We're committed to advancing the many ways people achieve today, inspiring action, and anticipating what theyll need tomorrow.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: In order to give customers fresh and clear experiences with their brand, companies need to focus on simplifying their customer experiences. Those efforts will drive innovation and growth for their business.
Branding is important to the success of any organization, but it?s particularly important for us at Contoso Electronics.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: The importance of branding at Contoso

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: At the heart of branding at Contoso is the promise that is made by us to our customers. The brand promise tells them who we are, what we believe in, and what unique value we provide.
